name: campus solver
tag_list: internet, networking, placement, jobs, communities, notes, birthdays, solutions
overview:
Campussolver is a campus utility network that provides solutions to various aspects of college life. In pursuance of its vision it offers following solutions/services to its members-

  • Campus Community Campus Community offers users the flexibility to create communities of their choice, with a name and suitable credo. The user can create communities with the aim of providing solutions to other visitors. A visitor can paste his/her problems (for e.g., depression) to a suitable community registered with campussolver.com (for e.g., Psychological Counseling). The members of community can jointly work upon the problem and offer solution to the concerned person either free, or at a service charge as per decided by the mutual consent of the agreeing parties.

  • Campus Placements Campus Place is an open job portal created with a purpose to facilitate candidates to find the most suitable job from the best prospective employer. Employers can create their profile, post jobs, and search for resumes free of cost, but with the prior registration and confirmation with Campus Solver. The post resume feature also appears in the admin of user which also keeps track of vacancies applied by him/ her.

  • Campus Mart Campus Mart is zone of mutual exchange of goods and articles between two parties without an intermediary, so that both buyers and sellers can benefit in the best possible manner. After registering with campussolver.com a seller can upload the description of articles (expected price, condition, photo, etc.) throâ€™ his Admin that he wants to sell; and a buyer can search the articles from the Campus Mart item list and can contact the seller based on his/ her description.

  • Campus Coach Campus Coach aims to solve the common problem of locating a suitable coach by students and their parents. A member at Campus Solver wishing to offer coaching services in a subject/ area can list him/her self at Campus Coach with required details. The Coach services can be availed by any willing person free of cost. The students can search for the suitable coaches at campus solver for relevant subjects

  • Campus Messages

Campus Messages is a forum where members can write open messages, which are displayed at home page that everybody can see and read. However, if a member wants to write any private message to another member he/ she can do it by visiting the admin of those particular persons.

  • Campus News Campus News is a forum where a person can paste the news about his/ her campus or college. Such news are flashed at the Home page of Campus Solver.com, so that that all the users can take cognizance of it.

  • Campus Events Campus Events is a forum where a person can paste the events happening/ going to happen in his/ her campus or college.

  • Campus Birthday Campus Birthday is a unique feature to remind each other their birthdays, and wishing them in special manner. Once a member registers with Campus Solver, his/her birthday is displayed on the Home page of Campus Solver free of cost, so that all your friends can see it and wish you happy birthday.
